EditText.android:text:
Fourtune Mobile 
 App is meant to be a (gallery of games) App which is supported by a cryptocurrency ‘Fourtune’ that brings about a gaming reward system.


The Tokens purchased shall enable a reward system that will come about as a percentage of the tokens in the account. 


FOURTUNE is a Mobile Game Distribution Platform based on block-chain technology 
 with the intention of bringing fresh air to the gaining industry around the world.


Fourcus Group Ltd and Dragonfly join forces to bring games to everyone including people
 that are unbanked (over 2 billion according to Findex1) but have access to cash and 4G/3G/LTE smartphones.
 Their aim is to provide an income generating platform for content creators and gamers alike.


Customers will be able to access the FOURTUNE Store using an application
 built using DECSNT's library that will provide block-chain functionality.


While content providers will have access to the FOURTUNE Android SOK allowing them to
 include a range of features such as in-app purchases, rewards and more.
 Hence, consistency is secured across all the applications utilizing FOURTUNE.

During the FOURTUNE game-play, the reward system will auto-generate FOURTUNE tokens.
 These tokens can be then exchanged for Fiat currency, or can be used in the EVENTS section 
 which acts as the FOURTUNE store. They will be offered to end users via 
 internal exchange or using an existing reseller network of brick and mortar stores and mobile operators.


FOURTUNE's four architectural layers manage all of these tasks.
 The transaction layer is responsible for managing all block-chain transactions between clients,
 publishers and Fourtune CPU. The data layer stores all the content securely and reliably,
 while the EVENTS section itself provides the basic business logic on top of the data and 
 transaction layers managing entities available in FOURTUNE. 
 The final layer, the application layer, is an interface for gamers and event enthusiast.
